title: HL7 v2.x message support (ADT, ORM, ORU, DFT)
summary: Healthcare Standards: HL7 v2.x message support (ADT, ORM, ORU, DFT)
description: Support HL7 v2.x message formats including ADT (Admit/Discharge/Transfer), ORM (Order), ORU (Observation Result), and DFT (Financial Transaction) for integration with hospital information systems and other healthcare applications.
